name: wristband-python-fastapi-accelerator
description: Full-stack application accelerator with FastAPI backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run database" "npm run frontend"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.setup-python: cd backend && python -m venv .venv && echo 'Python virtual environment created. Activate it with: source backend/.venv/bin/activate (Unix/Mac) or backend\.venv\Scripts\activate (Windows)'
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup-python && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.install-firebase: npm install -g firebase-tools && echo 'Firebase tools installed globally. You may need to login with: firebase login'
